title: Emerald and Pearl 'Pachi' Necklace - A Timeless Haaram
materials: 8 pearls). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite 'Haaram' showcases a fusion of traditional 'Pachi' setting with contemporary design. The central focus lies in the eight oval-cut, vibrant green emeralds, each meticulously bezel-set and surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. Delicately handcrafted gold petals interspersed with diamonds form a unique cascading pattern, culminating in gracefully dangling South Sea Pearls, known locally as 'Mutyalu'. The design reflects the grandeur of Telugu heritage with a modern sensibility.
colors: with the rich green of the emeralds providing a striking contrast. The white sparkle of the diamonds is beautifully complemented by the creamy
iridescent golden hue of the South Sea Pearls.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for grand receptions and formal events
adding a touch of timeless grace to your ensemble.
description: This necklace represents the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of emeralds and pearls is considered highly auspicious and signifies prosperity and good fortune. The intricate diamond detailing and lustrous Hyderabadi polish ensure its brilliance and durability, making it a cherished heirloom piece for generations to come. It beautifully blends tradition with contemporary design, making it a versatile piece for both traditional and modern wardrobes.
